they're bored of a cultural

the planet is being destroyed, we are creating an underclass we
are exploiting poor people all over the world

and the genuine legitimate problems of the people

I suppose what's happened is this is what I
believe in mate, is that certain

I think of

contempory by powers and politics is a

power truthfully

respected

think of yourself as a manifestation of some higher thing

lie the answers to everything

get yourself in line with that stuff and you beam like the sun

look at my hair look at these bracelets
look at these ridiculous boots

are the things that we all share

love unity togetherness as long as we

that suppress these ideas in favour of

as long as these ideas are promoted

title: Russell Brand - Time for a Spiritual Revolution
